entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Jovite 2:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
